title: r/AmITheA**hole for Traumatizing My Boyfriend by Peeing Outside?
description: r/AmITheA**hole In today's episode, OP is a young woman whose boyfriend absolutely loves to go hiking. She agrees to go on a hiking trail with her boyfriend. He constantly forces her to drink water, so naturally she really feels the urge to go while she's on the trail. Eventually, she can't hold it anymore and has to go behind a bush. OP's boyfriend becomes FURIOUS with her for "ruining" his favorite hiking trail. Is OP the butthole in this situation?
dc:creator: rSlash Reads Reddit
